channel.description: Journeying through APIs, data models, and seamless integrations

item.title: Featured - Global Load Balancing and Resilience for MuleSoft Private Spaces in CloudHub 2.0 utilizing Amazon Networking Services
item.description:
Today we feature the post Global Load Balancing and Resilience for MuleSoft Private Spaces in CloudHub 2.0 utilizing Amazon Networking Services by Michael McDonnell. In his post, Michael explains how to configure Global Disaster Recovery, leveraging the Anypoint Platform Private Spaces and AWS Route 53.

Check it out, and make sure to follow Michael for more insightful posts on integration architecture and security!
